data.message: I would really love to see a filter by keyword feature on the news feed. For example, with all of the status updates about last night's Presidential debate, it would be GREAT to be able to filter out any updates that contain the word "debate".

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Cynthia. Facebook's search bar is a great tool to search for key words. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2d3LdF6. If you have any additional feedback, we'd love to hear it: http://bit.ly/2d3Km7w. -Brad
